timeline.message:
:art: Inspect and refactor (NetBeans option)
* Convert to switch over Strings
* Remove .floatValue()
* Remove .intValue()
* Convert to for-loop (skipped some)
* Some lambda expression (skipped some)
* Repalce with multicatch
* Use member reference (skipped some)
* Convert to try with resoruce

:race_horse: Performance Improvements
Used the NetBeans Inspect and Refactor option and ran through all possible performance options and pretty much implemented them all.

timeline.bodyText: I might be being picky, but would it be better to have null on the RHS of the argument?
timeline.author: aldebaran30701

replies.bodyText: That's cool @aldebaran30701 and I'd agree. This bit was generated by NetBeans during the refactor but if I was writing it I would have put null on the RHS. I missed this in my review of the code. Thanks.
replies.author: arcturus2
